title: Oxidation induced by the antioxidant glutathione (GSH)
abstract: Remarkably efficient oxygen atom transfer from an intermediate of glutathione (GSH) autoxidation to an organometallic ruthenium arene thiolato complex is observed under physiologically-relevant conditions
